publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-656 Angela Constance: West Lothian Success at Special Olympicsâ€”That the Parliament is proud to recognise the success of the West Lothian sportsmen and sportswomen at the Special Olympics recently held in China; congratulates Scott Bruce, Christopher Maxwell, Christina McSherry, Frances Skiftesvik, Richard Hendry and Stephen Brown who all won gold medals in their respective disciplines of powerlifting, football and cycling, and commends the support and dedication of those involved in the sports coaching and organisation of the West Lothian delegation to the games at Shanghai. Supported by: Alex Neil*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Rob Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, George Foulkes*, Christina McKelvie*, Bill Wilson*
S3M-656 West Lothian Success at Special Olympics (lodged on 18 October 2007) Brian Adam*, Christine Grahame*, Bashir Ahmad*, Robin Harper*
S3M-656 West Lothian Success at Special Olympics (lodged on 18 October 2007) Gil Paterson*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-656 West Lothian Success at Special Olympics (lodged on 18 October 2007) Sandra White*
S3M-656 West Lothian Success at Special Olympics (lodged on 18 October 2007) Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-656 West Lothian Success at Special Olympics (lodged on 18 October 2007) Joe FitzPatrick*
